title: Eomer, Sister-son of Theoden (4C266)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	7
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Aragorn
Game Text:	While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. At the start of each turn, you may heal a [Rohan] ally.
Lore:	”'Now indeed there is hope of victory!'”
Rarity:	C
